reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and approachable. The lectures are engaging, but the exams can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor who makes complex concepts easy to understand. Highly recommend his classes!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is competent but tends to rush through the material. Could benefit from a clearer explanation of some topics.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is passionate about chemistry and provides great hands-on labs. Occasionally, lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is fantastic! Her enthusiasm and in-depth knowledge make her classes a joy to attend.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris has a lot of knowledge but struggles to communicate it effectively. The class was often disorganized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson’s lectures are engaging and well-organized. She provides good historical context but can be strict on deadlines.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson’s class is intellectually stimulating, but his grading is inconsistent and feedback is often delayed.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about literature and encourages lively discussions. The workload is heavy, but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is a great professor with real-world insights. His classes are thought-provoking and he’s very approachable.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Moore covers interesting topics but her lectures can be monotonous. More interactive elements would improve the class.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is knowledgeable and his problem-solving approach is very practical. The pace can be intense, though.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Green’s passion for art is infectious. Her lectures are inspiring and she provides excellent feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Carter’s class is data-heavy and challenging. He’s knowledgeable but sometimes lacks clarity in his explanations.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Young is committed to environmental issues and her enthusiasm is evident. Her classes are informative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. King’s lectures are often disorganized and he is not very responsive to student questions. Improvement needed.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is amazing! Her passion for the subject shines through and she makes complex concepts accessible and exciting.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is a talented musician and teacher. Her classes are dynamic and she provides a lot of practical experience.

reviews.subject: Theatre
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson’s classes are creative but sometimes lack structure. Great for hands-on learning but needs better organization.

reviews.subject: Education
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is very supportive and provides valuable insights into educational theory. Her feedback is constructive and helpful.

reviews.subject: Finance
reviews.review: Dr. Brooks is a fantastic professor with real-world experience. His lectures are engaging and he is always available for help.
